post.body: I'm good at eliciting the "ewwww" response :-)
@LongestWiener I understand. I've cut back and only work 20 hours per day now. Cheri, suggest date/time to the two of us :-)
Ok, @DrMani can also recommend great host. Good choice for many new sites: http://tinyurl.com/RecommendedHost
Maybe you, David and I could do a 3-way brainstorming session. Depends upon when it is... keep me in the loop.
You can access from radio show on free media publicity starting @ 4:05pm EST on Dec 16th @ http://BlogTalkRadio.com/WillieCrawford/
Tell them that maybe it's the growth hormones or other chemicals put in the livestock feeds. They should buy that :-)
You are still listed as a member. Let me know if you misplaced your username and password.
Thanks Elizabeth. It should be a lot of fun, profitable, and build contributors' businesses :-)
I guess at such a low pricepoint I look for less proof. Knowing the person for 7 or 8 years is also likely a factor.
That would take all the fun out of teasing :-)
Yes. When web copy works on me I analyze what I liked about the copy. I also often rationalize that others would want it.
Yes, @DrMani inspires and challenges me :-)
@AndyBeard That @robertplank probably will come up with something while taking a shower. He's almost as smart as I am :-)
Agreed, and it can be tough enough getting affiliates who will actually promote that they should be treated like partners!
An option is 2 landing pages. One for product owner & those searching one search engines. Another for affiliate links to point 2
I am a trouble-maker! I teach affiliates who can/will deliver a lot of sales to ask for custom landings pages if necessary.
You know your customers better than I do. I do know affiliate who insist on a page without that link... or even an opt-in.
Agreed although that's a little extra setup :-)
Wonder who's silly enough not to follow you. I'll have a serious talk with them.
Given that MOST affiliates do nothing anyway, it's just as productive to recruit affiliates on download page or inside products
I just feel that if affiliates are investing their time & resources in sending you customers, customers should not be distracted
I don't think that you can determine it directly. You could do a split test and make an inference.
Same here Bill. Your event is in January. I was mainly speaking of the 20 or so events this week :-)
I personally target long-tail keywords that are also generally phrases buyers would be using.
Good night then. Still EARLY morning here :-)
The print version of that cookbook is sold out incidentally. Only the PDF version is currently available. The bonus really helped!
http://Chitterlings.com/cookbook.html sells a cookbook that comes with 38 bonus PFD cookbooks on a CD. Those were all give to me!
Thanks Laura. Just sharing some ideas how I actually USE free stuff. Let me share an example too.
Thanks Jennifer. I try to pack a lot of useful content into my shows :-)
Yes, we should launch joint TIMIC project on-time. Would be good to have more TIMIC members check in :-)
@MarkClayson is also grilling me on Thursday morning on HIS radio show :-) http://www.putontherack.com/willie/ Lite wk tho
You mean you can't multi-task?
Yes.... that's been true for several years :-)
I have a LOT of product reviews already on my plate. You may want to check out http://TIMIC.ORG
Ok, i see the problem it cause :-)
Thanks for training me :-)
Why use ' instead of " ??
Thanks @DougFirebaugh for recommending http://talkingcommunities.com for conf/webinar services
It's actually a great way to find new/original products to sell or bundle with your own product before your competitors do!
In this & many giveaways registered contributors can access gifts early too :-) http://SageMarketer.com/ListBuilding/
Hi Elizabeth, no you can contribute to the giveaway until January 1st at http://SageMarketer.com/ListBuilding/
It's one of numerous free products you access by registering at http://SageMarketer.com/ListBuilding/
"The Ultimate SEO Friendly Low-Cost Dream Hosting Solution For Niche Bloggers " http://www.nichesimple.com/willie/ I did say ULTIMATE :-)
New blog post: The Perfect Gift For An Internet Marketer http://tinyurl.com/6p4vzr
TIMIC members - new group project just started has your name all over it! Will roll-out FAST though. Check in at http://TIMIC.ORG
Check in at The Internet Marketing Inner Circle http://TIMIC.ORG Brainstorming with the brightest minds in online marketing :-)
Mere MENTION of one "guru's" name in The Internet Marketing Inner Circle recently almost got me shot :-) Reputations can change so quickly!
New blog post: HOW TO GET FREE MEDIA PUBLICITY Learn Real Secrets to Getting Free Press Coverage http://tinyurl.com/5fjv8y
New blog post: What's A Speed Sale? http://tinyurl.com/5v5qrh
Another copywriter who's very simple style I like... because it works on me :-) http://tinyurl.com/5c6ynw
Being interviewed on affiliate marketing by @BobTheTeacher in 10 minutes http://SageMarketer.com/BobTheTeacher/ Bob's radio show!
On call with Erik Stafford http://eriks12daysofchristmas.com/willie/
http://tinyurl.com/55kzcj is a great way to give a newbie the benefit of your experience too!
Help out the newbie marketers who will get brand new computers for Christmas http://tinyurl.com/55kzcj
I think they want the secret to how I sell so many seminar seats :-) http://SageMarketer.com/ListBuilding/ Register then download PDF
People are loving free PDF, Hidden Methods That I Use To Sell More Big Ticket Items. Sign-in at: http://SageMarketer.com/ListBuilding/
New blog post: Please Join Me On This Call Tonight (Dec 22nd) At 9pm EST http://tinyurl.com/7dl3tn
Let's talk "Joint Ventures and Partnerships" tonight @9PM EST with @FasterWebmaster http://eriks12daysofchristmas.com/willie/
Tweeple @RockYourDay is looking for affordable conference/webinar capability for 1000+ participants. Recommendations?
UPS dropped several unexpected gifts off today... Christmas is getting to be fun :-)
